name: postCustomersCustomerCardsResult
title: When You Create a New Credit Card, You Must Specify a Customer or Recipient on Which to Create It
description: When you create a new credit card, you must specify a customer or recipient on which to create it. If the cardâ€™s owner has no default card, then the new card will become the default. However, if the owner already has a default, then it will not change. To change the default, you should update the customer to have a new default_source
